base_description: Gray, round container with a lid.
part_description: Consists of a circular lid and a tapered base; includes a small tab on the side for handling.
internal_interaction_description: The lid fits snugly onto the base, creating a seal. The tab on the side allows for easy removal of the lid, ensuring secure closure and convenient access.
external_interaction_description: Designed to contain substances, it can be used for storage or transport. The tab aids in opening, while its shape allows stacking with similar containers. Its neutral color and design make it suitable for various environments.
